title.text: Defining the Semantics of Verbal Modifiers in the Domain of Cooking Tasks

abstractContent.text: SEAFACT (Semantic Analysis For the Animation of Cooking Tasks) is a natural language interface to a computer-generated animation system operating in the domain of cooking tasks.

entities.text: Semantic Analysis For the Animation of Cooking Tasks)

abstractContent.text: SEAFACT allows the user to specify cooking tasks "using a small subset of English.
The system analyzes English input and produces a representation of the task which can drive motion synthesis procedures.
Tl~is paper describes the semantic analysis of verbal modifiers on which the SEAFACT implementation is based.
